attributes.action: reward people for recycling rather than introduce fines for not recycling.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hilary Benn's proposals yesterday which seem to suggest that councils will be able to check bins and fine people who do not recycle will be unpopular and seen as another aspect of our lives were the government are applying undemocratic and invasive scrutiny to. Surely it would be better to reward people?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
